sentences.en: Abdominal swelling or pain and jaundice are the presenting symptoms.
sentences.cn: 腹部胀满或疼痛和黄疸是本病的症状.

sentences.en: Abdominal tissues sometimes adhere after an operation.
sentences.cn: 手术之后腹部有时会出现粘连.

sentences.en: Colic describes a whole variety of conditions in which a horse suffers abdominal pain.
sentences.cn: 绞痛包括引起马匹腹部疼痛的各种病症。

sentences.en: Feeding too rapidly will cause abdominal distension and regurgitation.
sentences.cn: 喂得太快会引起腹胀和反流.

sentences.en: I was whisked into hospital with fierce abdominal pains.
sentences.cn: 因剧烈的腹痛,我被飞快地送进医院.

sentences.en: Intestinal suture is part of the story of abdominal surgery.
sentences.cn: 肠管缝合是腹部外科过程的一部分.

sentences.en: She was advised to have an abdominal X-ray.
sentences.cn: 她被建议拍一张腹部的X光片。

sentences.en: Some children with acute pharyngitis complain of abdominal pain and are febrile.
sentences.cn: 有些患急性咽炎的小儿诉说腹痛且有发热.

sentences.en: The abdominal aorta is normally smaller than the thoracic aorta.
sentences.cn: 腹主动脉一般比胸主动脉小.

sentences.en: The abdominal wound is subject to a considerable variety of complications.
sentences.cn: 腹部伤口易引发很多种并发症.

sentences.en: The acute abdominal pain of intestinal obstruction usually fluctuates.
sentences.cn: 肠梗阻时的急性腹痛常不稳定.

sentences.en: The majority of patients have vague abdominal pain or discomfort.
sentences.cn: 多数患者有腹部的隐痛或不适.

sentences.en: The stomach is a large pouch located high in the abdominal cavity.
sentences.cn: 胃是一只位于腹腔高处的大袋.

sentences.en: Through this incision, the abdominal cavity is distended with carbon dioxide gas.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳气体通过这个切口进入，造成腹腔肿胀。

sentences.en: Until the age of seven, respiratory movement is abdominal.
sentences.cn: 在七岁以前呼吸运动是腹式的.

words.tran_cn: 腹壁整形术；腹部去脂术；腹壁成形术

trans.tran_en: Abdominal is used to describe something that is situated in the abdomen or forms part of it
